metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9033 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library)1.5.13. There is a stack-based buffer over-read for the "Rank andDimension" feature in the function ReadNextCell() in mat5.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9033` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio9 - 1.5.13-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmatio package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.13-3').
